Package views

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminFunctions
    View for all admin functions
    Booking
    This view governs the logic behind pricing of tickets
    BookingHistory
    This is the view which writes data to the BookingHistory text file
    CreateHoliday
    View for creating a holiday
    CreateMovie
    View to create a movie
    DeleteMovie
    View for deleting a movie
    Login
    Login view
    Main
    Main view initiated at the start of the app
    MovieCRUD
    View for movie creation, updation and deletion
    MovieDetails
    The view to get the details of all the available movies
    Review
    Obatin the ratings for a movie by a user and input them in a txt
    ScreenCRUD
    This Class helps in Object Serialization to store an array of Screens (Cinemas) in 'Screen.txt'
    ScreenCRUD_admin
    This View Class is used by the Admin to create/delete/read Screens (Cinemas) and Show Times
    ScreenCRUD_user
    This View Class is used for the User to view available Show Time and Book Seats
    SearchMovie
    View for searching a movie
    SystemSettings
    View for going into System settings by admin
    Top5List
    Used to display the top 5 movies according to their rating
    UpdateMovie
    View for updation of movies
    UserFunctions
    Displays the user interface for the user module
